impact-statement: Building on previous work (Randel et al., 2014), a comparison of the visual neuronal circuitry in two <italic>Platynereis</italic> larvae, made using serial electron microscopic reconstructions, reveals a high level of stereotypy in the synaptic connectivity.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
